description:
Although Dark Schneider is captured in the form of Lucien, the impending crisis on Yoko and others drives him to break free on his own, and a battle with Di-amon ensues. A forefather of vampires, Di-amon is a formidable enemy with immunity against plain magic. Meanwhile, the Kingdom of Meta-llicana fights back against the Dark Rebel Armies` invasion, with Gara taking the lead. What is the fate that awaits these two battles?
Source: Official Website
